name: Perform evaluation on image multiclass inference unit and include default number (3) of images
description: with bounding boxes for areas focused on by the model.

steps.name: Given a valid, preconfigured inference unit for image multiclass classification supporting visual explanation bounding boxes
And an evaluation plan with no criteria for image multiclass classification with report spec for bounding boxes
And a uuid my_unique_identifier for the inference unit evaluation
And we read the evaluation plan
When we run inference unit evaluation
Then the generated report contains a file with a section with 3 images with bounding boxes explaining model focus during inference

fullName: As a data scientist, when evaluating an image inference unit, then I want the evaluation report to: Perform evaluation on image multiclass inference unit and include default number (3) of images

labels.name: feature
